mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PATIENT ( pat_idx, pat_name, pat_id, pat_pwd, pat_email, pat_address_post, pat_address_road, pat_address_detail, pat_phone, pat_phone2, pat_birthday, pat_gender ) VALUES ( pat_idx_seq.nextVal, #{pat_name}, #{pat_id}, #{pat_pwd}, #{pat_email}, #{pat_address_post}, #{pat_address_road}, #{pat_address_detail}, #{pat_phone}, #{pat_phone2}, #{pat_birthday}, #{pat_gender} )
mapper.select: select * from patient where pat_id = #{ pat_id }
select * from patient where pat_id = #{ pat_id } and pat_pwd = #{ pat_pwd }

select * from patient where pat_idx = #{ pat_idx }
